revised_title: Mapping Overlapping Projections from Area 4 to Motor Units in Baboon Hand
tldr: The authors used microstimulation to map the projections from area 4 of the motor cortex to motor units in the baboon's hand. They found that the colonies of pyramidal neurons projecting to the spinal motoneurons overlap, challenging the idea of a discrete and finely grained mosaic organization within the motor cortex.
